job.title: Senior Games Developer
job.description: A creative and collaborative working environment with a talented team of professionals. Opportunities for professional growth and the chance to work on high-impact online gaming projects. Flexible working hours and the possibility of working remotely or from our office in Tallinn, Estonia. A chance to shape the future of iGaming at Playstack OÜ and make a real impact on a global audience. Tallinn, Estonia
